In this open-top area there are up to ten container tiers one above the other directly on the double bottom. The high cell guides allow the crew to dispense with about 75 % of the otherwise normal lashing work. Large pumps keep the open area dry. The big logistical advantages when loading and unloading these ships are the basis for the success of the series. Another advantage compared to other freight ships is the high degree of flexibility regarding type, size and weight of the load. In cooperation with our experienced partners we have succeeded offering dredger which meets the most demanding requirements of our customers. A high degree of automation and the use of first-rate components mean we can ensure easy operation as well as low maintenance intervals. The flexible diesel-electric concept ensures efficient energy management. Whether dredging, scavenging or moving: the diesel-electric concept distributes power to where it is needed. Using diesel as fuel instead of heavy oil ensures environmentally friendly operation as well as allowing operation near the coast.
